title: Chicken roasted over sourdough with morels, peas and wild garlic mayonnaise
description: A spring Sunday roast packed with wild garlic and morel mushrooms. The sourdough soaks up all the delicious roast chicken juices
ingredients: ½ garlic bulb, unpeeled, from a whole bulb cut horizontally
½ large, round, slightly stale sourdough loaf, from a whole loaf cut horizontally
salt and freshly ground black pepper
